feed.title: Pinchflat Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.11.27
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Track the predicted final filepath for indexed media items by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/461
  • [Enhancement] Add support for yt-dlp plugins + add lifecycle script event for app boot by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/465
  • [Enhancement] Add option to use existing Media Profile as template for new profile by @loop-index in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/466
  • [Enhancement] Adds ability to enable/disable sources by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/481
  • [Bugfix] Ensure livestreams aren't downloaded until they're finished processing by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/485
  • [Enhancement] Add audio track language selection to Media Profile by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/487

New Contributors

  • @loop-index made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/466

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.10.30...v2024.11.27

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.12.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Add presets to cutoff date input by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/494
  • [Housekeeping] Bump Phoenix LiveView to 1.0.0 by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/495
  • [Enhancement] Add support for 1440p as a preferred resolution by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/498
  • [Housekeeping] Update config options to enhance NixOS compatibility by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/493

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.11.27...v2024.12.10

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.12.29
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • truncate table columns via css by @robertkleinschuster in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/507
  • Separate tabs for pending and downloaded in media history by @robertkleinschuster in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/508
  • [Enhancement] Add sorting, pagination, and new attributes to sources index table by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/510
  • use css truncate everywhere and remove StringUtils.truncate function by @robertkleinschuster in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/513
  • [Housekeeping] Pass the current action when calling the yt-dlp runner by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/514
  • [Bugfix] Respect cookies preference when performing download pre-check by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/517
  • [Enhancement] Added OPML Endpoint for podcast rss feeds by @robertkleinschuster in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/512

New Contributors

  • @robertkleinschuster made their first contribution in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/507

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.12.10...v2024.12.29

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2024.12.31
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bugfix] Improve OPML route security by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/535

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.12.29...v2024.12.31

entry.title: New release for Pinchflat: v2025.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Enhancement] Overhaul indexing to be more efficient by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/540
  • ⚠️ This is a big one! It's worth reading through the notes in the PR. Please make a bug report if you have an issue ⚠️
  • [Enhancement] Mark chapters with SponsorBlock by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/542
  • [Enhancement] Add media profile, source, and media item IDs as options for output templates by @kieraneglin in https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/pull/543

Full Changelog: https://github.com/kieraneglin/pinchflat/compare/v2024.12.31...v2025.1.3
